Summary: Disk streaking across California in sunset
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Malibu
There were no other sightings in Malibu on or around March 3rd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsHusband called me and asked me if we shot off a missile or something in the horizon. He said theres something bright streaking across the horizon and he saw no less than 5 planes going after it. I looked but couldn't figure out what he was talking about. I ran in and got my camera around 6pm and took pics of the west horizon looking out somewhere towards Mailibu I think. I found the streaking object and followed it in zoom mode as I could see firey streaks coming off the end and saw it swerve right a bit too. I could see 2 streaks under it, probably from the aircraft chasing it. So it went south into some trees in my front yard and I lost it as it seemed to be going a bit downwards too.
